---
title: "About"
---

This website renders the figures from of the [EpiClass paper](https://doi.org/10.1101/2025.09.04.670545) originally created using Python and Plotly.

Most figures are interactive, thanks to Plotly. The related code is present on Github, at [rabyj/EpiClass](https://github.com/rabyj/EpiClass/tree/master).
